analyzed: vuttam ha etam bhagavatā vuttam arahatā iti me suta
tayo me bhikkhave puggalā santaḥ savijjamānāḥ lokasmi
avuṭṭhika samaḥ padesa vassī sabbattha abhivassī
katham ca bhikkhave puggalaḥ avuṭṭhika samaḥ hoti

original: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sabbesaññeva na dātā hoti, samaṇabrāhmaṇakapaṇaddhikavanibbakayācakānaṁ annaṁ pānaṁ vatthaṁ yānaṁ mālāgandhavilepanaṁ seyyāvasathapadīpeyyaṁ.
analyzed: idha bhikkhave ekaccaḥ puggalo sabbesam eva na dātā hoti samaṇa brāhmaṇaka paṇaddhika vanibbaka yācakānam annam pānam vattham yānam mālā gandha vilepanam seyyā āvasatha padīpeyya

original: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo avuṭṭhikasamo hoti.
analyzed: evam kho bhikkhave puggalaḥ avuṭṭhika samaḥ hoti
katham ca bhikkhave puggalaḥ padesa vassī hoti

original: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ekaccānaṁ dātā hoti, ekaccānaṁ na dātā hoti samaṇabrāhmaṇakapaṇaddhikavanibbakayācakānaṁ
analyzed: idha bhikkhave ekaccaḥ puggalaḥ ekaccānam dātā hoti ekaccānam na dātā hoti

original: annaṁ pānaṁ vatthaṁ yānaṁ mālāgandhavilepanaṁ seyyāvasathapadīpeyyaṁ.
analyzed: annam pānam vattham yānam mālā gandha vilepanam seyya āvasatha padīpeyya

original: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo padesavassī hoti.
analyzed: evam kho bhikkhave puggalaḥ padesa vassī hoti
katham ca bhikkhave puggalaḥ sabbattha abhivassī hoti

original: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sabbesaṁva deti, samaṇabrāhmaṇakapaṇaddhikavanibbakayācakānaṁ annaṁ pānaṁ vatthaṁ yānaṁ mālāgandhavilepanaṁ seyyāvasathapadīpeyyaṁ.
analyzed: idha bhikkhave ekaccaḥ puggalaḥ deti samaṇa brāhmaṇaka paṇaddhika vanibbaka yācakānam annam pānam vattham yānam mālā gandha vilepanam seyyā āvasatha padīpeyya

original: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo sabbatthābhivassī hoti.
analyzed: evam kho bhikkhave puggalaḥ sabbattha abhivassī hoti

original: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
analyzed: ime kho bhikkhave tayo puggalā santaḥ sa vijjamānāḥ lokasmin ti

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
analyzed: ayam pi atthaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā iti me sutam ti
